@using IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls
@code { protected override async Task OnAfterRenderAsync(bool firstRender) { var treeGrid = this.treeGrid; var employees = this.employees; } private IgbTreeGrid treeGrid; private IgbGridToolbarTitle employees; private EmployeesNestedData _employeesNestedData = null; public EmployeesNestedData EmployeesNestedData { get { if (_employeesNestedData == null) { _employeesNestedData = new EmployeesNestedData(); } return _employeesNestedData; } } }

using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
public class EmployeesNestedDataItem
{
    public double ID { get; set; }
    public double Age { get; set; }
    public double Salary { get; set; }
    public double Productivity { get; set; }
    public string City { get; set; }
    public string Country { get; set; }
    public string Phone { get; set; }
    public string HireDate { get; set; }
    public string Name { get; set; }
    public string Title { get; set; }
    public List<EmployeesNestedDataItem_EmployeesItem> Employees { get; set; }
}
public class EmployeesNestedDataItem_EmployeesItem
{
    public double Age { get; set; }
    public double Salary { get; set; }
    public double Productivity { get; set; }
    public string City { get; set; }
    public string Country { get; set; }
    public string Phone { get; set; }
    public string HireDate { get; set; }
    public double ID { get; set; }
    public string Name { get; set; }
    public string Title { get; set; }
}
